trans-unit.source: Please type the correct password directly into the text box below and click the button below.
The Password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

source.g: Un guide sur la meilleure façon de se déplacer en Belgique!
This station has been nominated among the most beautiful train stations in the world.
This brand new station was designed by Spanish architect Santiago Calatrava. The grand opening took place on Dec 18 2009
This 1847 building was entirely renovated in 2011. It now provides all the services of a modern station while maintaining its historical character.
This rural station is unattended. Only local train stop here. There is nothing special about it, except this is where I live!
This underground station was designed by world famous architect Victor Horta.
Click on the blue dots to see the corresponding station
The departure time of the train
Type and number of the train
Click on the Next button to explore the various components of the schedule.
Click on the yellow poster to use when traveling by train on a Saturday.
Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
Click anywhere or press ‘y’ to continue.
Different trains go to the same direction.
How to choose the best one?
are local trains. They stop everywhere.
only ride during peak hours. They tend to be crowded!
are Inter City trains. They are fast and comfortable, but only stop at major cities.
Except on some special international trains, there is no reservation and no assigned seats on Belgian trains. Feel free to take any train you want and to sit anywhere you like
Regular tickets are good for occasional travel
Passes give you 10 rides anywhere in the country
Buy your ticket or fill-in your pass BEFORE boarding the train
Look for last minute changes (delays or platform changes)
You entered a first class coach with a second-class ticket!!!
You are ready to discover Belgium by train.
Answer the following questions the best you can.
Your answers will be reported to the LMS.
I learned interesting things in this online course
eLearning is a great learning solution
I would recommend this course to a friend
Please, take some time to fill in this survey.
Your anwsers are very important to us as the will help us create even better eLearning in the future.

trans-unit.source: Correct - Click anywhere or press 'y' to continue.
Partially Correct - Click anywhere or press 'y' to continue.
Incorrect - Click anywhere or press 'y' to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.
The time to answer this question has expired. Click anywhere or press 'y' to continue.
You have answered all questions. What do you want to do next?
One or more questions is incomplete. Answer all questions to continue.
You have not answered a few questions yet. Are you sure you want to proceed without answering those questions?
You did not answer this question completely.
